speaker:
SIR
               
              HUGH
text:
Go
               
              your
               
              ways
              ,
               
              and
               
              ask
               
              of
               
              Doctor
               
              Caius’
              
              house
               
              which
               
              is
               
              the
               
              way
              .
               
              And
               
              there
               
              dwells
               
              one
               
              Mistress
              
              Quickly
              ,
               
              which
               
              is
               
              in
               
              the
               
              manner
               
              of
               
              his
               
              nurse
              ,
              
              or
               
              his
               
              dry
               
              nurse
              ,
               
              or
               
              his
               
              cook
              ,
               
              or
               
              his
               
              laundry
              —
              his
              
              washer
               
              and
               
              his
               
              wringer
              .

speaker:
SIR
               
              HUGH
text:
Nay
              ,
               
              it
               
              is
               
              petter
               
              yet
              .
               
              Give
               
              her
               
              this
               
              letter
              
              
                (
                handing
                 
                him
                 
                a
                 
                paper
                )
              
              ,
               
              for
               
              it
               
              is
               
              a
               
              ’oman
               
              that
               
              altogether’s
              
              acquaintance
               
              with
               
              Mistress
               
              Anne
               
              Page
              ;
              
              and
               
              the
               
              letter
               
              is
               
              to
               
              desire
               
              and
               
              require
               
              her
               
              to
               
              solicit
              
              your
               
              master’s
               
              desires
               
              to
               
              Mistress
               
              Anne
               
              Page
              .
               
              I
               
              pray
              
              you
              ,
               
              be
               
              gone
              .
               
              I
               
              will
               
              make
               
              an
               
              end
               
              of
               
              my
               
              dinner
              ;
              
              there’s
               
              pippins
               
              and
               
              cheese
               
              to
               
              come
              .
